full_summary:
### Sanitary Sewer Discharge Pipe Replacement at Donnacona Prison Center
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Reference Number:** WS4200440106
**Close Date and Time:** October 26, 2023, at 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the construction project at the Donnacona Correctional Facility. A new sanitary sewer discharge piping system is required to replace the existing system, which is inefficient and partially obstructed. Cleaning chambers will be installed on the new piping to facilitate necessary maintenance and cleaning.

This project aims to improve the overall performance and efficiency of the pumping station. The selected construction services will be responsible for designing, building, and integrating the new piping system according to the specifications outlined in the request for proposal.

The following requirements apply:

- Region of delivery: Quebec (except NCR)
- Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Contract duration: To be determined

Contractors must meet specific criteria:

- Ability to submit a competitive bid with the lowest price
- Familiarity with Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Notes:
- Official trade agreements: None
- Regions of opportunity: Quebec and other areas in Canada

Only completed submissions that meet all specifications and requirements will be evaluated and considered for this project.

For further information, contact:
Samuel Pearson
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

E: [samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: A Technical Inquiry Session (TI) may be held to address contractors' questions. Additional information will be provided for those who submit written questions. Only selected responders will receive a notice of contract award. Be sure to check the government website for updates.
